ygData.subject: Re: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: The enchanted weapons came from the various high level good races. Specifically, then enchanted battleworn morningstar came from a high priestess of Brell that
ygData.messageBody:
The enchanted weapons came from the various high level
good races. Specifically, then enchanted battleworn
morningstar came from a high priestess of Brell that
were in East Karana. So, you will find 1 maybe two on
the whole server as they were event items.

Eylena




> <SNIP><<During the actual dark elf invasion,
> Enchanted weapons were dropped,
> as
> well as a few really nice artifacts. Then, after
> Innorukk cast the
> zonewide spell of instant death, the first wave of
> undead spawned and
> killed those who were returning to their corpses.
> For the first 2 real
> life days, these undead dropped Tainted weapons.
> The tainted were just
> as good as teh Enchanted in most cases except they
> were no drop and had
> -5 sv disease. Then the GMs announced that the
> undead would not spawn
> in kithicor, at least for a while. This was
> probably due to the fact
> that the weapons were way too nice. After another
> couple days the
> undead came back but only dropped Ruined weapons,
> and much more rarely.
> The Ruined weapons have the same stat bonuses but
> much worse attack and
> delays. Im not sure if the undead have been changed
> again tho, as i
> havent hunted there for a while.
> Snos>>
